name: tm94
effect: Teaches rock smash to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Rock Smash to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
